participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: brave and resilient, having overcome significant challenges in life.
participant_1.background: i was forced to marry when i was 15. my aunt helped me escape when i was 18. i was born in somalia. now i live in the united states.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: active and health-conscious, with a vibrant personality and a passion for sports.
participant_2.background: i enjoy sports such as running. i'm a vegetarian. my favorite color is blue. i am married. i am a woman.
